name: The Gamma_B Experience 2: Viewer Apocalypse
description:
After last month's stream, Gamma's streams have suddenly faced a drop in viewers. As it turns out, events from the past have come back to haunt the present, and Gamma must save a few of his friends, along with some quirky new characters, in order to restore order and bring his streams back into the spotlight. Can he do it? Or will his streams fade into obscurity?

Rated M for:

  • Extreme Violence
  • Cartoon Violence
  • Strong Language
  • Gore
  • Fear
  • Drug use
